source.f213749b:
X = data.drop(['admit_chance','serial_no'], axis=1)
y = data['admit_chance']
X_train = X[:400] 
X_test = X[400:] 
y_train = y[:400]
y_test = y[400:]
source.a339de7b:
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingRegressor
from sklearn.neighbors import KNeighborsRegressor
from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeRegressor

model_li = [['Linear Regression', LinearRegression()],
            ['Random Forest Regressor',RandomForestRegressor()], 
            ['Gradient Boosting Regressor',GradientBoostingRegressor()],
            ['K Nearest Neighbor Regressor',KNeighborsRegressor()], 
            ['Decision Tree Regressor',DecisionTreeRegressor()]]

for name,model in model_li:
    model.fit(X_train,y_train)
    pred = model.predict(X_test)
    print(name,np.sqrt(mean_squared_error(y_test,pred)))
source.56335dd1: **CGPA, GRE Score and TOEFL Score have higher correlation with Chance of Admission.**
